About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment only. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for most records. Past staff/student research service for a fee.

About.Access: One week's advance notice of visit required.

About.Acquisition focus: Records relating to the development, history and activities of the College (80%). Old Collegian memorabilia (20%).

About.Major holdings: School magazines, 1885- Student enrolment records, 1882-. College prospectuses, 1882-. College Council Minutes, 1882-. School memorabilia and photographs, 1882-.
